name: Ditto
flavorText:
Capable of copying
an enemy's genetic
code to instantly transform itself
into a duplicate
of the enemy.

previous.name: Lapras
previous.flavorText:
A POKéMON that
has been over­
hunted almost to extinction. It
can ferry people
across the water.

next.name: Eevee
next.flavorText:
Its genetic code
is irregular.
It may mutate if it is exposed to
radiation from
element STONEs.
